lead_paragraph: World number one Novak Djokovic recovered from a first-set loss to overcome Germany's Mischa Zverev while Britain's Andy Murray swept past Belgium's David Goffin to reach the Shanghai Masters semi-finals on Friday.
snippet: World number one Novak Djokovic recovered from a first-set loss to overcome Germany's Mischa Zverev while Britain's Andy Murray swept past Belgium's David Goffin to reach the Shanghai Masters semi-finals on Friday....

headline.main: Djokovic Survives Zverev Scare, Murray Cruises in Shanghai
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Survives Zverev Scare, Murray Cruises in Shanghai
